name: CargoCombat
description:
In Cargo Combat you controll a container ship from the top down perspective.

You can Shoot with one of three Launchers: Torpedo-Launcher, Artillery-Launcher or Machinegun-Launcher.

The goal is to rank up your Ship to the maximum Rarity.

At Ports you can by contracts to farm more gear or spawn a boss enemy (if you have enough credits).
